Title: Allows industrial development agencies to make grants to municipalities for open space preservation, parkland improvements and conservation easements
Summary: Allows industrial development agencies to make grants to municipalities for open space preservation, parkland improvements and conservation easements where the municipal governing body finds that the grant encourages tourism or otherwise improves quality of life.
LawCode: Amd ยง858, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to allowing industrial development agencies to make grants to municipalities for open space preservation, parkland improvements and conservation easements
